test-method.name: verifyProductsButtonVisibility
test-method.description: Verify that the “Products” button is visible on the navigation menu

test-method.name: verifyNavigationToAllProductsPage
test-method.description: Verify navigation to “ALL PRODUCTS” page from the “Products” button

test-method.name: verifyProductListingsDisplay
test-method.description: Verify that the “ALL PRODUCTS” page displays product listings

test-method.name: verifyProductSearchFunctionality
test-method.description: Verify search/filter options on “ALL PRODUCTS” page

test-method.name: verifyNavigationToProductDetailPage
test-method.description: Verify that user can click on a product to open its detail page.

test-method.name: verifyProductDetails
test-method.description: Verify product detail page displays name, category, price, availability, condition, and brand.

test-method.name: verifyNavigationBackToAllProductsPage
test-method.description: Verify navigation back to 'ALL PRODUCTS' page from the product detail page.
